name: The Mouse Game
description:
The Mouse Game is a hardcore puzzle game where you control a mouse and avoid deadly traps in order to secure the cheese. Run, dodge, and weave your way through 35 increasingly difficult levels!

PERSONALIZE your mouse with dozens of unlockable colors and accessories!

UNLOCK a diverse range of rewarding achievements!

CHALLENGE your skills with 5 unique gameplay-altering challenge modes!

IMPROVE your best attempts with faster completions!

CONQUER the insurmountable A.C.E. achievement!
